verses.text: \w This|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w Maintain|strong="H6213"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w right|strong="H4941"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* coming \w soon|strong="H7138"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w revealed|strong="H1540"\w*.

Blessed \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w holds|strong="H2388"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w fast|strong="H2388"\w*, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w keeps|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w without|strong="H6213"\w* \w profaning|strong="H2490"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w keeps|strong="H8104"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.”

Let no \w foreigner|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H5971"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w joined|strong="H3867"\w* \w himself|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* say, “\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* utterly exclude \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.” \w And|strong="H1121"\w* let \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w eunuch|strong="H5631"\w* \w not|strong="H5971"\w* say, “\w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w but|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dry|strong="H3002"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*.”

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w*: “\w To|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w Sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* choose \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w pleases|strong="H2654"\w* \w Me|strong="H8104"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* \w fast|strong="H2388"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*—

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w within|strong="H1004"\w* \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w memorial|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*. \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w foreigners|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w join|strong="H3867"\w* \w themselves|strong="H2388"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* love \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*— \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w without|strong="H1961"\w* \w profaning|strong="H2490"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* \w fast|strong="H2388"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*—

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w bring|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w make|strong="H8055"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w joyful|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*. \w Their|strong="H3605"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* \w accepted|strong="H7522"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H1004"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* \f + \fr 56:7 \ft Cited in Matthew 21:13, Mark 11:17, and Luke 19:46\f* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w*.”

Thus \w declares|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3478"\w* \w gathers|strong="H6908"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w dispersed|strong="H1760"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: “\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w still|strong="H5750"\w* others \w besides|strong="H5921"\w* \w those|strong="H5921"\w* already \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w*.” Israel’s Sinful Leaders

Come, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*; eat greedily, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*.

Israel’s \w watchmen|strong="H6822"\w* \w are|strong="H3045"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3045"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* oblivious; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3045"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* mute \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w*, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w bark|strong="H5024"\w*; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H3045"\w* \w dreamers|strong="H1957"\w* \w lying|strong="H7901"\w* around, loving \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w slumber|strong="H5123"\w*.

\w Like|strong="H1870"\w* ravenous \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w*, \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w satisfied|strong="H7654"\w*. \w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* discernment; \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w turn|strong="H6437"\w* \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* seeking \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w* \w gain|strong="H1215"\w*:

“\w Come|strong="H1961"\w*, \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w me|strong="H3947"\w* \w get|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, \w let|strong="H1961"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w* imbibe \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w strong|strong="H7941"\w* \w drink|strong="H7941"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w tomorrow|strong="H4279"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w*, only \w far|strong="H3966"\w* better!”
